Text:
There are also two free linear algebra texts at these locations

http://joshua.smcvt.edu/linearalgebra/

http://linear.ups.edu/

As a note to those downloading, please seed this torrent. I don't have a very fast upload speed and so this torrent will die if people do not seed back at least 1.1 times. I will continue to upload for a bit though there should already be about 5 seeders.
